sentences.en: After having some refreshments, they all got into the rickshaws.
sentences.cn: 吃完点心, 大家上车.

sentences.en: At a late hour dainty refreshments were served.
sentences.cn: 最后并有精美茶点招待.

sentences.en: Customer may choose different coffee, refreshments and beverage on their own will.
sentences.cn: 顾客可根据各人不同喜好选择不同的咖啡, 西点和饮料.

sentences.en: During a break for refreshments, they discuss their jobs.
sentences.cn: 在休息的间歇, 他们讨论着各自的工作.

sentences.en: Light refreshments will be served during the break.
sentences.cn: 中间休息时有点心供应。

sentences.en: Lunch and refreshments will be provided.
Mo kept bringing me out refreshments and fanning me as it was that hot.
sentences.cn: 天气太热了，莫不停地给我拿饮料出来，还拿扇子给我扇风。

sentences.en: Refreshments can be obtained at the station.
Refreshments will be served and the $ 10 membership fee will be refunded.
sentences.cn: 会中备有茶点以及退还$10会费.

sentences.en: Refreshments will be served to anyone who's alive at the end.
sentences.cn: 饮料将会提供的如果谁最后还有命喝的话.

sentences.en: She toasted slices of bread for refreshments.
sentences.cn: 她烤了几片面包当茶点.

sentences.en: The hostess served refreshments after the tennis matches.
sentences.cn: 网球赛后女主人请大家吃茶点.

sentences.en: The refreshments made with flowers have broad marketing space and developing prospect.
sentences.cn: 鲜花制作点心具有广阔的市场发展前景.

sentences.en: Tim : They just brought in refreshments. Please help yourself.
sentences.cn: 茶点已经准备好了, 请用.

sentences.en: We have to make a small charge for refreshments.
sentences.cn: 我们得收取少量茶点费。

sentences.en: We stopped and had some light refreshments at cafe.
sentences.cn: 我们停下来在一家咖啡店用了一些清淡的点心.

trans.tran_cn: 茶点( refreshment的名词复数 )，点心，（精力的）恢复，精神爽快
trans.tran_en: Refreshments are drinks and small amounts of food that are provided, for example, during a meeting or a trip
